amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to replace the text of the bill with language that specifies that English is the primary language of the United States and that the U.S. Government should pursue policies that promote English as the common language of the United States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute to express that it is the sense of Congress that the U.S. government should pursue policies that promote English as a common language.

action.text: Amendment (A002) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Serrano.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Serrano amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 250 (Roll no. 389).
